name: darwin-store
description: A self-aware vulnerable application for Darwin demos. The Store reports its topology and metrics to the Darwin BlackBoard brain, and accepts chaos injection from the Chaos Controller.

scripts.test: npx playwright test tests/test_shopping_cart.spec.js tests/verify_ui.spec.js tests/verify_frontend_customers.spec.js tests/verify_shopping_cart.spec.js tests/verify_search.spec.js tests/verify_dashboard.spec.js tests/verify_invoice_ui.spec.js tests/verify_reviews_ui.spec.js
